verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne sthuthinchedanu yesu namamunu Bhajinchedanu kristhu namamunu Stuthiki yese yogyudani Nityam nityam ne sthuthinchedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aaa prabhu krupa prema kanikaramul varnimpa nevvariki tharamouna? Papini nannu rakshinchutakai chupenu premana paramuga{/lang-eng}
